java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
IConnector
public class SSHConnector
extends AbstractConnector

Connector to MX via SSH and executed MQL console.

Constructor Detail

SSHConnector

public SSHConnector(String _sshServer,
                    int _sshPort,
                    String _sshUser,
                    String _sshPassword,
                    String _mqlPath,
                    String _mqlUser,
                    String _mqlPassword,
                    boolean _log,
                    boolean _updateByFileContent)
             throws Exception
Initializes / opens the SSH connection to the SSH server and starts the MQL console on this SSH server.

Parameters:
_sshServer - name of the SSH server
_sshPort - port of the SSH server
_sshUser - user of the SSH server
_sshPassword - password of the SSH server
_mqlPath - path of the MQL program on the SSH server
_mqlUser - name of the MX user
_mqlPassword - password of the MX user
_log - must the MX communication logged?
_updateByFileContent - must the update done by sending also the file content?
Throws:
Exception - if the SSH connection could not be opened
Method Detail

execute

public String execute(String _arg1,
                      String _arg2,
                      String _arg3)
               throws Exception
Executes a 'dispatch' of the MxUdpate Update tools on the MX server. Calls directly the dispatcher in the MQL console for given arguments within one line. In this line also a print context is made so that in the case of an error also a value is returned. In this error case an exception is thrown with the text from the error stream.

Parameters:
_arg1 - first argument
_arg2 - second argument
_arg3 - third argument
Returns:
returned value from the execution
Throws:
Exception - if execute failed

readError

protected String readError()
Reads current stack of read errors.

Returns:
error string
See Also:
errBuf

disconnect

public void disconnect()
Closes the channel, session and the #client.

convertMql

protected String convertMql(CharSequence _text)
Converts given string by escaping the " so that in escape mode on string could be handled with " and '.

Parameters:
_text - character stream to convert
Returns:
converted string

logOutput

protected void logOutput(byte[] _buffer,
                         int _start,
                         int _len)
Used to log the MX communication for the error purpose. The logError buffer is written to the MX console if a new line is sent from the output stream.

Parameters:
_buffer - byte array with the logging characters
_start - start position within the _buffer
_len - length
See Also:
out, logOutput

logError

protected void logError(char _char)
Used to log the MX communication for the error purpose. The logError buffer is written to the MX console if a new line is sent from the error stream.

Parameters:
_char - character to log
See Also:
err, logError
